sentences.en: Each morning the priest spent an hour in quiet contemplation.
sentences.cn: 每天早晨牧师都要默祷一小时.

sentences.en: He reached his decision after a good deal of contemplation.
sentences.cn: 他经过周密思考后作出了决定.

sentences.en: He roused himself from his lazy contemplation of the scene beneath him.
sentences.cn: 他不再懒洋洋地注视着下面的景色。

sentences.en: He sat there deep in contemplation.
He spent many hours in deep contemplation.
sentences.cn: 他花了多个小时专心思考.

sentences.en: He was lost in the contemplation of the landscape.
sentences.cn: 他对着眼前的景色沉思起来。

sentences.en: His mind kept branching off into the contemplation of silly things.
sentences.cn: 他总不能专心于正题而尽想着愚蠢的事情.

sentences.en: I am quite content with philosophic contemplation.
sentences.cn: 我非常满足于哲理性的冥想.

sentences.en: It is a place of quiet contemplation.
sentences.cn: 这是个静心冥想的好地方。

sentences.en: She bought three dresses in contemplation of her trip.
sentences.cn: 她为了作一次旅行买了三套衣服.

sentences.en: She was lost in contemplation of the scene in front of her.
sentences.cn: 她给眼前的这一幕深深地吸引住了.

sentences.en: Sophia was charmed with the contemplation of so heroic an action.
sentences.cn: 想到这样一种悲壮的行为,苏菲亚不胜陶醉了.

sentences.en: The greatest of all pleasures consists in the contemplation of truth.
sentences.cn: 所有快乐中最伟大的快乐存在于对真理的沉思之中.

sentences.en: The monks spend an hour in contemplation each morning.
sentences.cn: 那些修道士每天早上默想一小时。

sentences.en: There is rest and healing in the contemplation of antiquities.
sentences.cn: 欣赏古物有休息和疗养之功.
